column4: can some help me fix my resolution?  it is too low 800x600?  Nvidia GeForce FX 5500 w/ 256m
did u check the logs if ur using restricted driver?
How do I do that?  I'm a newbie.
open terminal then run this 'cat /var/log/Xorg.0.log | grep nvidia'
System>Admin>Hardware Drivers shows Nvidia not enabled.  Enable it?
BRB - need to restart system.  okay?
Nvidia enabled.  Still res. 800x600. Ubuntu keeps asking for restart
the two rounded blue arrows at upper right
